it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.persistence.util

Class Mapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.persistence.util.Mapper

  • public class Mapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to convert a List of Objects in a Map.
    Author:
    Cristian Laurini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mapper() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.List<AssetEntity>> getMapAssets(java.util.List<AssetEntity> assets)
      This method converts a List of AssetEntities in a Map with the id of the asset class as key and the List of AssetEntites for that class as value.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CustomStrategyEntity> getMapCustomStrategy(java.util.List<CustomStrategyEntity> customStrategyList)
      This method converts a List of CustomStrategyEntities in a Map with the id of the asset class as key and the CustomStrategyEntity as value.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,FinancialDataEntity> getMapFinancialData(java.util.List<FinancialDataEntity> data)
      This method converts a List of FinancialData in a Map with the id of the asset as key and the FinancialDataEntity as value.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,PortfolioEntity> getMapPortfolio(java.util.List<PortfolioEntity> portfolioList)
      This method converts a List of PortfolioEntities in a Map with the id of the asset as key and the PortfolioEntity as value.
      static java.util.Map<java.time.LocalDate,java.math.BigDecimal> getMapValues(java.util.List<Value> values)
      This method converts a List of Value in a Map with the date as key and the value as value.
